product_desc:
It’s Friday night and nobody knows what to do. How do you get things going? Open your phone and see which movies are starting soon in your neighborhood: invite your friends to meet you there. Go and have fun.

How can you do this and more? With Cinemarun — the only movie app focused on time rather than theaters or movies.

It’s perfect for those times when you’re looking for something to do at the last minute.

Just enter your ZIP Code or turn on Location Services on your iPhone and let the app do the rest. What could be easier?

Individual movie pages allow you to buy tickets directly, share the details with your friends, and add to your calendar.

This app will be in great demand. Get in on the ground floor now.
name: Cinemarun
